Same-day Appointments for Short-term/Emergency Help

  • Counseling center: 217.333.3704
  • College of Liberal Arts & Sciences counselor, Sharon Benekohal: benekohl@illinois.edu
  • Faculty, Staff, and Graduate Student Assistance Program: 217.244.5312

Report Misconduct

1. Any misconduct in the chemistry department

Report misconduct in the chemistry department

2. Sexual misconduct (on-campus)

  • Policies/Procedures: wecare.illinois.edu/policies/campus/
  • Reporting information: oae.illinois.edu/reporting.html
  • Forms for reporting: uillinois-gme-advocate.symplicity.com

3. Ethical misconduct (on-campus)

  • Ethics reporting information
  • Hotline: 866.758.2146
